attributes.action: To use the proceeds of the Air Passenger Duty to improve security and reduce passenger waiting times.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the Air Passenger Duty is here to stay; under the guise of the 'green banner'. Would in not be more palatable to the air traveller if some or all of this tax were directed to improving airport security and reducing passenger waiting times.
